openapi: 3.0.0
info:

    get:
      responses:
        "200":

          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
      links:
        l:
          $ref: "#components/linfks/address"
  links:
    address:
      operationId: getUssssserAddress
      parameters:
        userId: $request.path.id
